resources.string:
1. Marks in Class 10th or equivalent for TCS Eligibility – more than 60% 

 2. Marks in Class 12th or equivalent for TCS Eligibility – more than 60% 

 3. Marks or CGPA in Class 10th or equivalent for TCS Eligibility – more than 60% or 6 CGPA on scale of 10
1. B.E. / B.Tech in any discipline (CSE/ECE/IT/CIVIL/ME/EEE/Automobile/Aeronautical etc.)\n\n 2. Engineering candidates who have passed out in the year 2019 are eligible to apply.

1. A candidate must have more than 60% marks in 10th and 12th (or diploma).

 2. A candidate must have a minimum of 65% marks or CGPA 6.5 in graduation.

 3. A maximum of 2 years of gap is permissible in the entire education.

 4. A candidate should not have any pending backlogs at the time of appearing for Infosys selection process.
1. B.E / B.Tech in any discipline (CSE/ECE/IT/CIVIL/ME/EEE/Automobile/ Aeronautical etc.)\n\n 2. Engineering candidates who have passed out in the year 2017 and 2018 are eligible to apply.

1. A candidate must have more than 60% marks in 10th and 12th (or diploma).

 2. A candidate must have a minimum of 60% marks in graduation and Post Graduation ( if applicable).

 3. A candidate should not have any pending backlogs at the time of appearing for Wipro selection process.

 4. The graduation should be a Full-Time course recognized by Central/State government of India.

 5. A candidate must have completed all the exit formalities in the previous organization before joining Wipro.

1. HCL recruitment process requires the students to have at least 60% in their 10th, 12th and Graduation.

 2. A maximum gap of 1 year is permissible after HSC(12th) and not after SSC(10th) or in between semesters of graduation to sit for HCL Recruitment.

 3. A candidate should not have any pending backlogs at the time of appearing for HCL selection process.

1. A candidate must have more than 60% marks in 10th and 12th (or diploma).

 2. A candidate must have a minimum of 60% marks in graduation and Post Graduation ( if applicable).

 3. A candidate should not have any pending backlogs at the time of appearing for Wipro selection process.

 4. The graduation should be a Full-Time course recognized by Central/State government of India.

 5. A candidate must have completed all the exit formalities in the previous organization before joining DELL.
